title: The Blame
description: Can people grow without growing apart? Is the love and passion in a marriage doomed to turn into indifference and irritation? Expat Laura Cruz finds that her life in Lisbon is in a rut. Could an affair with a charming, older business associate be the answer to the slump her marriage is in? Or should she be sensible and focus on getting her marriage back on track? Then tragedy suddenly strikes, and the horrifying secret Laura and David must bear will either bring them together again or forever drive them apart.
author: Nichola Park
